c1.name: Crow's Eye
c1.descriptionRaw:
When Tengu Juurai grant characters ATK Bonuses or hits opponents, the CD of <color=#FFD780FF>Tengu Stormcall</color> is decreased by 1s.
This effect can be triggered once every 3s.
c1.description:
When Tengu Juurai grant characters ATK Bonuses or hits opponents, the CD of Tengu Stormcall is decreased by 1s.
This effect can be triggered once every 3s.

c2.name: Dark Wings
c2.descriptionRaw: Unleashing <color=#FFD780FF>Tengu Stormcall</color> will leave a weaker Crowfeather at Kujou Sara's original position that will deal 30% of its original DMG.
c2.description: Unleashing Tengu Stormcall will leave a weaker Crowfeather at Kujou Sara's original position that will deal 30% of its original DMG.

c3.name: The War Within
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Subjugation: Koukou Sendou</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Subjugation: Koukou Sendou by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Conclusive Proof
c4.descriptionRaw: The number of Tengu Juurai: Stormcluster released by <color=#FFD780FF>Subjugation: Koukou Sendou</color> is increased to 6.
c4.description: The number of Tengu Juurai: Stormcluster released by Subjugation: Koukou Sendou is increased to 6.

c5.name: Spellsinger
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Tengu Stormcall</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Tengu Stormcall by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Sin of Pride
c6.descriptionRaw: The <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color> of characters who have had their ATK increased by Tengu Juurai has its Crit DMG increased by 60%.
c6.description: The Electro DMG of characters who have had their ATK increased by Tengu Juurai has its Crit DMG increased by 60%.
